content.rendered:
Class names for the 2020-2021 school year were selected by the children during their transition visits and online ‘meet the teacher’ sessions.

Nursery – Rainbow Rangers

Reception – Dr Ranj’s Rangers

Year 1 – Nina’s Neurons

Year 2 – Sensational Seacoles

Year 3 – Courageous Colonel Moores

Year 4 – Fantastic Flemings

Year 5 – Hippocrates Heroes

Year 6 – Winston’s Wonders

jetpack-related-posts.title: Reception
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Reception (F2) Class Page!     EYFS Intent Statement. please read here: EYFS Intent Statement     We are Dr Ranj’s Rangers. Along with FS1, The Rainbow Rangers, we are The Get Well Gang! Our class mascots! Dr Ranj is our class mascot along with Nurse Morag and Terry…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 4
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 4 Class Page! Miss Alderson, Mrs Gale and Mrs Akrill are looking forward to a fantastic year with Year 4. Our Curriculum is listed below: Long term planning cycle B Y3-4 Year 4 will need to be times tables wizards this year as they are the first class to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 6
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 6 Class Page! Welcome to year 6... your last year here at Springvale Primary! Meet the amazing team...Mrs Mayston, Mrs Wildsmith, Mrs Kent, Miss Heeley and Mrs Haigh! We are kind, crazy and fun....especially when you do fantastic work and are super kind to each other! It’s a year…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Writing, Spelling and Grammar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are developing our subject leader roles in school and all newly appointed leaders are reviewing their subject's curriculum. Progression documents demonstrating the whole school pathway: Progression in writing composition Progression in writing transcription Progression in writing vocabulary grammar and punctuation A summary of the curriculum for writing and grammar…

jetpack-related-posts.title: School Day
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Since COVID, the school day is now organised as follows: Class Start End Playtime Lunch Year 6 8.30am 3.30pm 10.50-11.10am 12.30-1.30pm (1pm lunch) Nursery 8.35am 11.35am or 2.35pm (30h) Outdoor Learning 11.35-12.05pm lunch Reception 8.40am 3.00pm Outdoor learning 12-1.00pm (12noon lunch) Year 1 8.45am 3.05pm 10.15-10.35am 12.20-1.30pm (12.20 lunch) Year…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Year 1
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 1 Class Page! We are the Excellent Earhearts! We have an exciting curriculum that links the EYFS and the KS1 formal curriculum. During the year children access a range of exciting topics to enthuse and excite them! Our teacher is Mrs N Evans Our class is supported by…
